title: muruga enbadhum
sahitya: Muruga ennbadhum unaithanoyanai mugathon undanin moothavano   anupallavi  Uruga nenjinil uraividamai erundeKudikolla seidhidum vadivazhagave (Muruga) caraNamVarugai enre unndanai ullanbudan azhaithalumVandhe arul thandhidum valli manallanoThandhaiku ubhadesam seidhavan neerthanoDharaniyor potrum sundira velavano (Muruga)
